name: BearnTokenGateway
description: Gateway handles verifying mint and burn requests. A mintAuthority approves new assets to be minted by providing a digital signature. An ownernpm of an asset can request for it to be burnt.

functionDecorators.name: burn
functionDecorators.description: burn destroys tokens after taking a fee for the `_feeRecipient`, allowing the associated assets to be released on their native chain.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The address to receive the un-bridged asset. The format of this address should be of the destination chain. For example, when burning to Bitcoin, _to should be a Bitcoin address.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the token being burnt, in its smallest value. (e.g. satoshis for BTC).

functionDecorators.name: claimTokenOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Claims ownership of the token passed in to the constructor. `transferStoreOwnership` must have previously been called. Anyone can call this function.

functionDecorators.name: feeRecipient
functionDecorators.description: When tokens are mint or burnt, a portion of the tokens are forwarded to a fee recipient.

functionDecorators.name: hashForSignature
functionDecorators.description: hashForSignature hashes the parameters so that they can be signed.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The BearnTokenERC20 this Gateway is responsible for.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeRecipient
parameterDecorators.description: The recipient of burning and minting fees.

parameterDecorators.name: _mintAuthority
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the key that can sign mint requests.

parameterDecorators.name: _mintFee
parameterDecorators.description: The amount subtracted each mint request and forwarded to the feeRecipient. In BIPS.

parameterDecorators.name: _burnFee
parameterDecorators.description: The amount subtracted each burn request and forwarded to the feeRecipient. In BIPS.

functionDecorators.name: mintAuthority
functionDecorators.description: The mintAuthority is an address that can sign mint requests.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: recoverTokens
functionDecorators.description: Allow the owner of the contract to recover funds accidentally sent to the contract. To withdraw ETH, the token should be set to `0x0`.

functionDecorators.name: status
functionDecorators.description: Each signature can only be seen once.

functionDecorators.name: token
functionDecorators.description: Each Gateway is tied to a specific BearnTokenERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferTokenOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allow the owner to update the owner of the BearnTokenERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: updateBurnFee
functionDecorators.description: Allow the owner to update the burn fee.

parameterDecorators.name: _nextBurnFee
parameterDecorators.description: The new fee for minting and burning.

functionDecorators.name: updateFeeRecipient
functionDecorators.description: Allow the owner to update the fee recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: _nextFeeRecipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address to start paying fees to.

functionDecorators.name: updateMinimumBurnAmount
functionDecorators.description: Allow the owner to update the minimum burn amount.

functionDecorators.name: updateMintAuthority
functionDecorators.description: Allow the owner to update the fee recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: _nextMintAuthority
parameterDecorators.description: The address to start paying fees to.

functionDecorators.name: updateMintFee
functionDecorators.description: Allow the owner to update the 'mint' fee.

parameterDecorators.name: _nextMintFee
parameterDecorators.description: The new fee for minting and burning.

functionDecorators.name: verifySignature
functionDecorators.description: verifySignature checks the the provided signature matches the provided parameters.
